website_summaries.verdict: Eye-catching and distinctly effective high-end tote.
pros: Impressive inside and out, this hand-crafted tote handles rough handling
Designed by a brand devoted to wine, reviews praise its perfection for boats, vineyards and more
cons: Best for two bottles of wine but not two bottles of champagne

customer_reviews.title: Well made, light and sharp looking.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely designed and attractive. Holds 3 bottles with built in separation to cushion the cargo. Tall enough to handle most bottle shapes. Has two zippered pockets to house tools and misc.. Can hold a rabbit sized opener but its going to protrude a bit. Otherwise, plenty of room to hold your Laguiole and screen. Its not going to handle a big funnel but should handle the narrow modern style funnel. My only criticism is that the it features a web shoulder strap when a leather one would have really set it all off nicely. Nice construction, good detail and nice finish work. Very light. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: vinmoet

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I had been watching this beautiful leather item for a while. It is made to last with a front and zipper pocket. I gave this to my wife as a BD gift! It can carry up to 3 bottles of wine if needed! Or you can do like we do and carry one bottle of wine two nice wine mugs and a decanter for letting the wine breath before drinking! In either case it is a nice accessory to your travel luggage or afternoon picnic!
customer_reviews.author: Neil Colquitt

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful present
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for a present for my brother in law. He loved it. Don't know how long it will hold up, but it seems to be well made. My only complaint is that delivery was longer than stated. It came after Christmas unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: phoenician lady

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and made well.
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this to anyway looking to carry wine or liquor. The quality is superb and I always get great compliments on the bag. It is not a brief case or computer bag.
customer_reviews.author: john wilson

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift but the recipient was very pleased with the item and reports that he has received ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift but the recipient was very pleased with the item and reports that he has received many complements and queries of "where did you find that."
customer_reviews.author: Winifred Lauder

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic wine carrier at an excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent wine carrier. It has the capability of carrying three bottles or you can actually put a decanter in with two bottles. The pockets are nice and it’s attractive and easy to carry. I actually bought one for a friend less than a month or two after I bought one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: jeff kesler

customer_reviews.title: Very well made bag
customer_reviews.text: Well made wine bag. The shoulder strap is the only problem. The strap, as mentioned in other reviews, cuts into your shoulder when the bag if full. Add a shoulder strap cushion and it is perfect. Lots of storage room for corkscrews and note pads. Would make a nice gift forthe wine geek in your life.
customer_reviews.author: J. JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST ONE I EVER HAS
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT. FANTASTIC VALUE FOR THE MONEY I WOULD LIKE TO SEE ON TWO BOTTLES SIZE
customer_reviews.author: Angel B. Malave

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my husband....and he loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality leather with a great design. I thought it might be too big (and wished it was a 2-bottle bag), but it’s a nice size. I bought it as a gift fro my husband and he just loved it. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and good looking
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bag. Very durable. I got as a gift for a friend and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: F. J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived this morning....without the shoulder strap. And the zipper pull fell off immediately. Not exactly what I had hoped to receive. Fortunately, Amazon is very good with returns and refunds.
customer_reviews.author: abby1234

customer_reviews.title: Top shelf wine carrier
customer_reviews.text: Really great carrier. Holds three bottles of when nicely. Great with groups of six.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder strap is not leather.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wine carrier as a special gift and would have given 5 stars if the shoulder strap was leather.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking triple bottle wine bag.
customer_reviews.text: Leather is a bit stiff and only other down side is that the top flap must be buckled to carry.
customer_reviews.author: James Palmisano

customer_reviews.title: Cheers!!
customer_reviews.text: For the person who wants to bring their own wine to dinner this is essential!!
customer_reviews.author: RRJ

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction
customer_reviews.text: A quality gift. I wish they had included some separaters for the wine bottles
customer_reviews.author: Lambert F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, large enough to hold several bottles of wine
customer_reviews.author: amc

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Leather !
customer_reviews.text: Worth 4 times the cost. Classy and top quality workmanship. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: John Woody

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but big
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful if that is what you are looking for. It is a bit heavy and has a little saddle bag type look to it. We returned and opted for a more simple bag that holds 6 bottles. It was not my husbands style as much but a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: THM

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Father was using this bag to hall around wine a year after he received it as a gift. Holds up great, and is a very good looking product.
customer_reviews.author: Plh7798

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Holds 3 wine bottles with dividers. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: JBD

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great wine bag - very good looking and functional. It’s cheaper on amazon v. the Wine enthusiast website.
customer_reviews.author: F. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money spent
customer_reviews.text: In appearance alone this is worth what you spent. All leather and solid construction so I expect my son and daughter in law will get a lot of good use out of this. No insulation in side as it is not meant for keeping things cool but they drink their wine at room temperature anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

product_meta.title: 3-Bottle Leather BYO Wine Bag
feature_bullets: PREMIUM 100% LEATHER WINE BAG is the ultimate wine carrier for taking your best bottles of wine to friends, restaurants, parties, or bringing them home from the store. This handsome classic leather bag shouts class.

3 POCKETS KEEP BOTTLES SECURE so you don't get jingling and banging possibly cracking bottles and causing a costly mess. Toss this bag in the back seat of your car and your bottles are caressed and protected all the way to your destination.

ROOMY DESIGN 14"H X 12" W X 6"D gives you enough space to take out the dividers and pack one bottle with a weekend worth of clothes. This doubles as a great getaway bag for any guy or gal. Lots of people find they can use this bag in multiple ways for excellent convenience.

HANDCRAFTED WITH EXCELLENT ATTENTION TO DETAIL. This bag is made by top leather craftsman and is one of the finest available. We take no shortcuts and don't use any substitutions. You get a classic all leather wine carrier just right for carrying your favorite vintages home from the winery, wine shop, or restaurant. Complete with antique brass buckle to secure the front flap.

100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE ensures this will quickly become your favorite no-risk purchase. Many people buy an extra bag so they can keep one in the car or at work. HURRY AND BUY NOW while we have this handmade specialty in stock. This makes a fabulous birthday present, Christmas gift, or anniversary gift. Great for friends, family, and co-workers - anyone who is a wine lover!
